      • getValidate

        @GetMapping(value="/")
public java.lang.String getValidate()
        Returns:
        opens main page of the application

      • getValidationPassed

        @GetMapping(value="/validationPassed")
public java.lang.String getValidationPassed()
        Returns:
        returns a page in case of successful credit card validation

      • getValidationFailed

        @GetMapping(value="/validationFailed")
public java.lang.String getValidationFailed()
        Returns:
        returns a page in case of failed credit card validation

      • getStyle

        @GetMapping(value="/style")
public java.lang.String getStyle()
        Returns:
        returns resource with style.css file (not available for user)

      • validate

        @PostMapping(value="/cards/validator")
public java.lang.String validate(@ModelAttribute
                                                                         CreditCardModel creditCard)
        Method is used for obtaining information from web page. As the result instance of CreditCardModel will be created, validation will be performed, the user will be redirected to another page depends on the validation result.
        Parameters:
        creditCard - model of the credit card
        Returns:
        web page, depends on validation result.
